chapters.title: Chapter 29:  Seanchan
chapters.info: Turak Aladon, p. 429 (378)—Leader of Those Who Come Before (i.e., the Seanchan raiders). His head is shaved bald, and his fingernails are about an inch long. He wears a long, blue silk robe brocaded with birds that drags on the floor for a long distance behind him. He has a collection of cuendillar figurines, including (thanks to the addition he took from Bayle Domon's ship) two seals on the Dark One's prison. It is these seals that Moiraine finds broken after the battle at Falme.
